name: ChristmasMole
description:
Click on the mole and earn points. One minute is given for one attempt. Try to score as many points as possible! Try yourself!

- One minute per attempt.

-Click on the moles that appear from the holes and earn points

-Be careful, if you catch a rabbit or a hedgehog, you will not get points, and 10 seconds will be deducted from the time

-For a mole in a blue hat, 10 seconds will be added to the time
